mapper.insert: insert into customer (id, identify, owned_company_id, name, sex, phonenum, adress, note_taker, record_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownedCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phonenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update customer set identify = #{identify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owned_company_id = #{ownedCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note_taker = #{noteTaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, identify, owned_company_id, name, sex, phonenum, adress, note_taker, record_time from customer
